name: Quote of the Day
description: A template that lets users get the quote of the day in different categories

give me a quote about love
show me daily quote for inspire

properties.comment: Welcome message
Change block state
Check if pronounced category exist in array allCategories
Use HTTP element to get json file from certain API
Pronounce text from json file
Preview text and picture with Card element on devices with display
Exit service with END session element

properties.text: I can't manage any more quotes of the day today. <say-as interpret-as="interjection">achoo</say-as>.  Please come back tomorrow.
